info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:02PM CDT until July 21 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TALLADEGA...CALHOUN...EASTERN ETOWAH...CENTRAL ST. CLAIR...NORTH CENTRAL CLEBURNE AND SOUTHWESTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 502 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Slackland to near Piedmont to 6 miles northwest of Bynum to near Odenville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Anniston, Oxford, Pell City, Jacksonville, Rainbow City, Piedmont, Hokes Bluff, West End-Cobb Town, Cobb Town, Fort McClellan, Saks, Lincoln, Glencoe, Weaver, Ashville, Riverside, Ragland, Munford and Ohatchee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
